summary: Adds 8 Legendary Rings from Morrowind to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 8 legendary rings that where present in Morrowind to Skyrim.

These 8 rings are:

Mentors Ring
Increases Magicka and Magicka Regeneration by 50/50%.

Denstagmers Ring
Resist Frost/Fire/Shock +30%.

Phynasters Ring
Resist Magic/Poison/Shock +20%.

Ring of Khajiit
Adds a Power and a Spell that make Invisible and increase Speed.

Ring of Surroundings
Adds a Power that improves Sneak and gives a strong Muffle Effect.

Ring of the Wind
Increase Speed and Attackspeed by 10%.

Vampiric Ring
Adds a Power and a Spell to steal the enemies life and stamina.

Warlocks Ring
Adds a Power and a Spell that reflect damage, increase speed and restore health.

The 4 Power will be added permanently to your spellbook, but can only be used when the corresponding ring is worn. The 3 Spells will only be added to your spellbook when you wear the ring. Those spells cost you magicka, but therefore can be used without restrictions.

Additional Artifacts:

Robe of the Drake\'s Pride
Increase Magicka by 50, gives 25% Fire Resistances and reflects 25% Damage.


Location of the Rings:
All enemies are non leveled and you should have atleast Level 25, better between 30 and 40.(Depending on your difficult setting)

Ancient Sealing Altar:
Between Windhelm and Whiterun on the top of a snowy mountain lies an ancient altar. There waits a terrible danger for every strong hero. Can you best this being and get its famous treasure?

Secret Thalmor Lookout:
East/Southeast of Windhelm on one of the moutain sides is a small,hidden encampment of the Thalmor. There the \"evil\" Altmer spy on the brave people of Skyrim. Will you stop them?

Morthal:
The traveling merchant Caius Varro has set up his tents in Morthal, further also the Gentleman\'s Corner had started business. Those two are connected through fate, will you be the guide?

Imperial Ghost Ship:
On a shore, northwest of Solitude, a ship clouded in thick fog can be found. What poor souls are bound there?
(No MapMarker till you board this ship!)


Whiterun:

Currently, the five(those that have no location till now) rings can be found outside of Dragonsreach(near the letter E from dragonsreach on the local map), on the right side in a chest (I have added a picture which shows the location). Only available there till all five other quests/locations are implemented.


Thanks, Updates and other usefull Informations:

Thanks to Bethesda for creating the Basic Mesh and Texture for the Ring of Khajiit (unused in Skyrim). I modified the texture and gave the rings the colors they had in Morrowind.


Plans for next Update:
The next time will most probably feature a big nordic dungeon with a story involving the companions.

Last Update:
Added the Imperial Ghost Ship.


If you find any bugs or have suggestion for improvements I would like to read/hear your opinion.
If you liked this mod please endorse it.

Installation:

Copy both Files into your Skyrim/Data.

Deinstallation:

Before you delete the two files, please unequip all rings and let wear off all effects from the rings!

Can also be found here:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=16030
